description:
A Ring`s Value
A ring appears out of the drawer that Dad gave to Mom a long time ago. Mom tells Fumi about her memories from back then.
Invitation
It seems that inviting friends over is popular in Fumi`s class. Fumi says that she invited her friends over, but the children`s room is in a mess and there`s only beer tidbits for snacks...
White Fumi Black Fumi 4
Fumi somehow manages to invite her friends over. From talking about their families, the story transfers to talking about Bunji. That`s when Bunji comes home. Fumi, who doesn`t want to show the ugly side of Bunji...
Momotaro Kid
Everyone knows about the story of Momotaro. Grandfather Bunji has gone to the mountain to gather firewood and Grandmother Fumi does the laundry. That`s when a huge peach floats down the river. When they open the peach, that`s when Momotaro Kid, Mom, appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Ring`s Value / Invitation / White and Black and Brother / Momotaroko
指輪の値段 / おまねき / 白ふみ黒ふみ4 / 桃タロ子
